gist.headline: Snap, list, sell
gist.blurb: SnapSell joins the garden. Turn your photos into instant product listings for Shopify and eBay with AI magic.
gist.summary: Added SnapSell to the Creative app showcase, a tool for generating AI-powered product listings for e-commerce platforms.
gist.impact: Users can now discover and access SnapSell directly from the Pollinations app directory to streamline their selling workflow.
gist.visual_concept: A cozy e-commerce photo studio. The bee is acting as a photographer taking pictures of items, while the robot organizes price tags or shipping boxes. Represents the 'snap and sell' workflow.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot taking a photo of a pixelated vintage lamp, while a small robot holds a price tag nearby. Lime green (#ecf874) and peach gradient background. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'SNAPSELL'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients.
